description: These four ingredient cookies make for a delicious breakfast on the go and are naturally sweetened with ripe bananas and cinnamon.
keywords: Cookie,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Banana,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free
name: Peanut Butter & Banana Breakfast Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 170°C/150°C fan-forced and line a baking tray with parchment.
Pour the oats into a large bowl. Whisk in the cinnamon and add the mashed banana and peanut butter. Mix well with a wooden spoon to form a dough.
Wet your hands and scoop the dough into 8 balls. Place on the baking tray and flatten with a fork.
Bake for 1012 minutes until golden. Remove from the oven and allow to cool for 10 minutes before serving.
